text: Are you aware of <https://quantumbrilliance.com/> ? They claim to have room tempartire quantum computers ready for deployment in the datacenter. Are they generic quantum computers or more something like  D-Wave?

I don't know much about them but I've worked with NV centres. I think they're using the NV and surrounding nuclear spins to give them ~4-5 qubits. I'm guessing they will only directly address the NV and then use the coupling to transfer to the nuclear spins
